sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SPIRIT, in metaphyſics, an incorporeal being or
intelligence ; in which ſenſe God is ſaid to be a ſpirit, as are angels and the human ſoul. See Metaphysics, Part III.

Spirit, in chemiſtry and pharmacy, a name applied to every volatile liquid which is not inſipid like phlegm or water ; and hence the diſtinction into acid, alkaline, and vinous ſpirits. See Pharmacy-Index.
Spirit of Wine. See Chemistry-Index, Distillation, and Pharmacy-Index.
